The best web hosting promotion is live. If you’re all set to start a website, let the business adventure begin with proper WordPress hosting. Hostinger lets you slash off $450 on its total hosting price and save a massive chunk of money.

This is essentially a promotion within the promotion. As you’ll see, you’ll be able to save up to 75% plus 15% on top of the already discounted price, using a special promotion code. We won’t keep you waiting — here’s the deal.

Grab Your Exclusive Discount Today

Get This Exclusive Hostinger Deal Now!

Not one, not two but three plans are part of Hostinger’s massive sale.

They include:

  • Premium at $2.99/mo; 75% off
  • Business at $3.99/mo; 71% off
  • Cloud Startup at $7.99/mo; 71% off

The initial discounts can be obtained through the buttons in this article. However, Gizmodo and Hostinger endorse an additional 15% discount on all three plans using the code GIZMODOSPECIAL.

How does it work?

Well, you just have to click the button and then select the Hostinger plan you want on the site. On the right side, find the “Have a Coupon Code?” hyperlink and click it. Now, copy and paste the code, and then press Apply.

As you can see, Hostinger will slash an additional 15% and save you more than $450 for the Premium plan. Business and Cloud Startup plans yield even higher savings of over $500 and $1,100, with more features on offer.

It’s worth noting that all three plans come with 3 free months on top and are fully refundable for 30 days. You have a month or so to test the best managed WordPress host and experience greatness first-hand.

More About Its WordPress Hosting

The key benefit of Hostinger is its managed WordPress service — built into every plan. This means you get valuable security and speed optimizations, along with automatic updates handled by Hostinger.

But what about the other features?

Let’s just say you get many freebies to start off your adventure.

Each plan comes with a free domain and WHOIS privacy, weekly or daily updates, a free website migration, Let’s Encrypt SSL, email hosting, and more. Users can enjoy 25 GB to 100 GB of SSD or NVMe storage, as well.

Plus, Business and Cloud Startup plans even allow e-commerce, making them great for building an online store. Hostinger’s plans also support WooCommerce if you’re going the more popular WordPress route.

LiteSpeed servers with object caching are there, and Hostinger offers groundbreaking DDoS protection and WAF to keep threats far away. As the icing on the cake, there’s a famous AI Website Builder for more variety.

If you’re stuck, 24/7 support will pull you out from the mud at the drop of a hat. Ample choice, beefy discounts, and a vibrant spectrum of features. There’s plenty to miss out or gain — it boils down to you.
